title: Conor Murphy – 2022 Comments on Cost of Living Crisis in Northern Ireland
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Conor Murphy, the Finance Minister in Northern Ireland, on 1 August 2022.
content:
We have repeatedly told the British government that they must act to support workers and families through the cost-of-living crisis as they struggle to pay their bills.
